product_name: PUMA x RCB 2025 Men's Replica Jersey
description: DescriptionShow your spirit for your beloved cricket squad with the PUMA x RCB 2025 Men's Replica Jersey. Be the embodiment of your team's legacy by wearing RCB's celebrated emblem.
